name: fruitfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is fruitful (= producing good results): I was looking for a way for the schools to collaborate fruitfully. To get the most from your life you need to fill it fruitfully. See
fruitful
More examplesFewer examplesWe need to be amused or entertained rather than being able to use our time fruitfully. This approach to history could fruitfully be applied to any country in the world.People with good mental health can cope with the normal stresses of life, and can work productively and fruitfully.
